name: John H. Stroger Jr. Hospital Reviews

review.title: “I've great some great experience at the hospital with patients also staff whom have express appreicate for a job well”
review.pros: Pros – Some of the best reason to be employee at stroger hospital is the benefits are good.
review.cons: Cons – Some of downsides to working at stroger is that at election time mangement changes when someone new is elected into office.Which means there a turn off in most positions.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – My advice to mangement would be that when things are changing , get ideas from the staff that works in the areas of change . also to put everything in writing .

review.title: “Crazy work environment, but always something to do, never boring.”
review.pros: Pros – Good attention to detail by management; great general learning environment. Good benefits, friendly staff, and overall fun group of people who do what they can with little resources and a hectic environment.
review.cons: Cons – Not a lot of negatives here. I guess traffic and parking are hard, and also, in the winter, it's a little harder to get around.

review.title: “It was excellent i gain all my working experience or most of it from working in their ambulatory clinics and hospitals”
review.pros: Pros – I like working with diverse community and meeting people of different cultures
review.cons: Cons – There is no cons excellent place to work
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Man!!!”
review.pros: Pros – Great experience ...you learn and see a lot
review.cons: Cons – Management sucks keep employees morale low
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Fire everyone and start over

review.title: “It's like any other day job in the medical field”
review.pros: Pros – After 25+ years of service at John Stroger, base pay doesn't get any higher than 89k. Over time is the only way to make more. But we get great benefits.
review.cons: Cons – Typical employee groups- lazy, hard-working, weird, funny. Nothing out of the ordinary
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Higher less lazy people.

review.title: “frustrating...but rewarding”
review.pros: Pros – This is an environment which really cares about the patients (clients). This is also a place with great camaraderie
review.cons: Cons – The infrastructure is neglected....the facility was brand new in 2002, and now appears 50 years old inside.Employee morale has dropped significantly with a slew of layoffs in the last few years.Advancement is nearly impossible without "connections"...merit is
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Work conditions need to improveIntroduce MERIT promotions

review.title: “Tough work, but rewarding”
review.pros: Pros – Interesting patient mix, working with the underserved
review.cons: Cons – Administration moves slowly, resources areImited

review.title: “Intern”
review.pros: Pros – Good pay and benefits for employees
review.cons: Cons – Employees need to be more respectful towards patients

review.title: “Ok”
review.pros: Pros – Working for them is ok. Management is ok. Coworkers are fun. Work life balance is not so bad. Overall experience is good.
review.cons: Cons – Hmmm enjoying it so far. Work can be physically tiring at times. Need to improve cleanliness though and probably hire more staff
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I think the management needs to review the way things are being managed in the hospital especially on cleanliness and efficiency.
